content.text: Match ends, Mallorca 1, Atlético de Madrid 1.
Second Half ends, Mallorca 1, Atlético de Madrid 1.
Foul by Diego Costa (Atlético de Madrid).
Dudu Aouate (Mallorca) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Kevin (Mallorca).
Diego Costa (Atlético de Madrid) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Giovani dos Santos (Mallorca) hits the right post with a left footed shot from outside the box from a direct free kick.
Álvaro Giménez (Mallorca) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Cata Díaz (Atlético de Madrid).
Diego Costa (Atlético de Madrid) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Javi Márquez (Mallorca) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Diego Costa (Atlético de Madrid).
Goal!  Mallorca 1, Atlético de Madrid 1. Kevin (Mallorca) left footed shot from the left side of the box to the top left corner.
Javi Márquez (Mallorca) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Raul García (Atlético de Madrid).
Foul by Tomás Pina (Mallorca).

Diego Costa (Atlético de Madrid) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Substitution, Mallorca. Ximo Navarro replaces Javier Arizmendi because of an injury.
Goal!  Mallorca 0, Atlético de Madrid 1. Raul García (Atlético de Madrid) right footed shot from very close range to the bottom right corner.
Attempt saved. Diego Costa (Atlético de Madrid) left footed shot from a difficult angle on the left is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Filipe Luis.
Corner,  Atlético de Madrid. Conceded by Dudu Aouate.
Attempt saved. Koke (Atlético de Madrid) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top right corner. Assisted by Tiago.
Substitution, Atlético de Madrid. Cristian Rodríguez replaces Adrián López.
Substitution, Mallorca. Kevin replaces Michael Pereira.
Attempt missed. Cata Díaz (Atlético de Madrid) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses the top left corner following a corner.

Corner,  Atlético de Madrid. Conceded by Dudu Aouate.
